name: Polar Shift
description:
The game revolves around a penguin who must defend his home against a polar bear and a group of seals who are causing trouble and disrupting his peaceful habitat by shifting them away from his home.

The game has a deeper meaning, portraying the penguin as a symbol of the impact of global warming, while the bear and seals represent humanity's role in causing this phenomenon, thus a 'shift' in temperatures.
